contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Settlement | name = Sinan | native_name = 신안 | native_name_lang = ko | settlement_type = [[List of cities in South Korea|County]] | translit_lang1 = Korean | translit_lang1_type1 = Hangul | translit_lang1_info1 = {{linktext|신|안|군}} | translit_lang1_type2 = Hanja | translit_lang1_info2 = {{linktext|新|安|郡}} | translit_lang1_type3 = {{nowrap|Revised Romanization}} | translit_lang1_info3 = Sinan-gun | translit_lang1_type4 = {{nowrap|McCune-Reischauer}} | translit_lang1_info4 = Sinan-gun | image_skyline = Korea-Heuksando Island-06.jpg | imagesize = | image_caption = A town in [[Heuksando]], one of the island in Sinan county. | image_map = South Jeolla-Sinan.svg | mapsize = | map_caption = Location in South Korea | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|South Korea}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Regions of Korea|Region]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Honam]] | population_blank1_title = Dialect | population_blank1 = [[Jeolla dialect|Jeolla]] | area_total_km2 = 653.13 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_total = 53150 | population_density_km2 = 81 | parts_type = [[Administrative divisions of South Korea|Administrative divisions]] | parts = 1 ''eup'', 13 ''myeon'' | image_blank_emblem = Sinan logo.png | blank_emblem_type = Emblem of Sinan }} '''Sinan County''' (''Sinan-gun'') is a [[Administrative divisions of South Korea|county]] in the province of [[Jeollanam-do]], [[South Korea]]. The county consists of 111 inhabited islands and 719 uninhabited islands. The number of islands in this county accounts for 25% of all islands in South Korea. Big islands among them are Anjwado (45.2㎢), Aphaedo (44.3㎢), Bigeumdo (43.1㎢), Dochodo (40.3㎢), Imjado (43.2㎢), Amtaedo (38.7㎢), Jeungdo (37.2㎢), Jangsando (24.3㎢), Haeuido (16.1㎢), and [[Heuksando]] (19.7㎢). The sea area is a [[continental shelf]] with less than 15 meter in depth. <ref name="encyber">{{cite web |url=http://www.encyber.com/search_w/ctdetail.php?masterno=101987&contentno=101987 |title=신안군 (Sinan-gun 新安郡)|publisher=[[Doosan Encyclopedia]] |accessdate=2008-05-11 |language=Korean|}}</ref> == Islands == * Anjwado (안좌도 安佐島:45.2㎢) * Aphaedo (압해도 押海島:44.3㎢) * Bigeumdo (비금도 飛禽島:43.1㎢) * Dochodo (도초도 都草島:40.3㎢) * Imjado (임자도 荏子島:43.2㎢) * Amtaedo (암태도 岩泰島:38.7㎢) * Jeungdo (증도 曾島:37.2㎢) * Jangsando (장산도 長山島:24.3㎢) * Haeuido (하의도 荷衣島:16.1㎢) * [[Heuksando]] (흑산도 黑山島:19.7㎢) * [[Hongdo]] (홍도 紅島 6.47㎢) ==Sister cities== Sinan is [[town twinning|twinned]] with: * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Gangnam-gu]], [[South Korea]] * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Mapo-gu]], [[South Korea]] * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Nowon-gu]], [[South Korea]] * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Ongjin County, Incheon|Ongjin]], [[South Korea]] * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Gyeongsan]], [[South Korea]] * {{flagicon|PRC}} [[Dawa County|Dawa]], [[PRC|China]] == See also == * [[Geography of South Korea]] * [[Jeolla]] == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://eng.shinan.go.kr/ County government home page] {{South Jeolla}} {{coord|34.827403|126.101146|source:ruwiki_region:KR_type:city(53150)|format=dms|display=title}} [[Category:Counties of South Jeolla Province]] [[Category:Sinan, South Jeolla| ]] {{SouthKorea-geo-stub}}
